channel.title: [PI] Resurrection - 2006/2007 Remake
channel.description:
[B]Features:
Doric's Quest Few skills bosses All Dupes Fixed NPC Spawns Perfect Combat Perfect Switching Clipped Following Clipped Npcs Compatible with PI 317 Loading 377
Half the team has either started there own project or left, I have no time to finish this in what was supposed to be the release date. So I will be making this open source and each time I update it (I will release when a few updates are made).
So One thing, Subscribe to this thread..Give a nice thanks and enjoy. [/B] [CENTER][B]Download Link:[/B] [code] http://up.ht/vif1rm [/code]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2me47yd.png[/img] [img]http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/6470/screenshot025u.png[/img] [img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/5782/screenshot026lk.png[/img] [img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/1011/screenshot027r.png[/img]
Credits: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/moe/]Moe[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/infexis/]Infexis[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/valedictorian/]Valedictorian[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/%60clayton/]`Clayton[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/thechosenone/]TheChosenOne[/url]
[/CENTER]

item.title: [PI] Resurrection - 2006/2007 Remake
item.dc:creator: @MoeFromRS MoeFromRS
item.description:
@MoeFromRS wrote:

[quote=“sonsofgod2, post:16, topic:443300”]Lol ok its bad…

So heres first errors. theres 2.

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:560: error: ‘)’ expected
if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(99
5, 1) {

 ^

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:629: error: ‘)’ expected
if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(99
5, 1) {

 ^

2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

and when you add ) to one of those it fixes only one code… if you add ) to both it gives 60 errors. when u compile[/quote]

-.-, fix it then…

It was quest I was going to wor kon, you can remove it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Resurrection - 2006/2007 Remake
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

i am infamy:

Good server, but dont get me wrong im not talking crap when im saying this but, ever since google got into development and started getting bigger everyone decides to start coding 2006’s all of a sudden but there is no point, because whoever makes a 2006 version right now is gunna have google as competition and a “Private Server” with 150k+ account registered is some scary competition, like i said im not talking crap, and there has to be atleast 20 people that agree with me.

There’s been plenty under development before it, not to mention private projects

Read full topic
